评论概述: Pocket lining fabric didn't last 2 months
评论详情: This coat has a very nice exterior fabric and fleece lining. I have washed this jacket a couple of times since purchasing the middle of October 2024. Both pockets have ripped out. My husband is elderly and does not use force when using the pockets. He has had many jackets that have lasted years. This is only 2 months old. I am very disappointed with the construction of the pockets.

My right pocket stitching is very cheap. I really only put my keys in it. The hole started off as a few strings coming out and after about a week there was a big enough hole my hand would go inside the hole inside of the pocket. I love this coat, but it's extremely cheaply put together. It will keep you warm and it does look nice. But the quality isn't there.  I did notice reviews about the similar issues with the pocket, but over looked them since there were more positive reviews vs negative ones. I've had this coat for about a month and it's already falling apart.

First, I like to say I love the jacket. The way it fits and all the pockets. Looks good too. I have worn it in 40-degree weather and it seems to keep me warm enough. The hood is the right size for my head. So far the bad part is the pockets. I am not sure if it is coming apart because of very cheap thread or, not enough material overlap. I got this jacket for work. Light physical work. You would think it should have gotten dirty before it starts falling apart. My oldest jacket that I have is just about 10 years old that I wash one or, two times a year. Still looks good. No holes or tears in or on it. I had another jacket that just laid down to rest that I used for work lasted 7 years. I picked that one up at Wal-Mart that made by Walls I believe. I am going back to that one next year. I don't think this jacket in going to last its first wash. So, if you are going to put anything else other than air in the lower side pockets. Look for another brand. And if I would have seen the washing instructions, I would not have brought this jacket. It is a shame. Because I really did like this jacket before the pockets started ripping apart.
